Package org.apache.mesos.specification

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigFileSpecification
    Represents an optionally templated configuration file to be written before the task is started.
    ResourceSpecification
    A ResourceSpecification encapsulates a Mesos Resource that may be used by a Task and therefore specified in a TaskSpecification.
    Service
    A Service, given a ServiceSpecification registers with Mesos and deploys, recovers, and maintains the specified Service.
    ServiceSpecification
    A ServiceSpecification defines the name of a Service and the types of Tasks which constitute the service.
    TaskSet
    A TaskSet groups a set of Tasks that should be deployed using the same deployment strategy.
    TaskSpecification
    A TaskSpecification is a simplified description of a Mesos Task.
    VolumeSpecification
    A VolumeSpecification defines the features of a Volume.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomTaskSetTest
    This class tests the ability to customize TaskTypeSpecifications.
    CustomTaskSetTest.CustomTaskSet  
    DefaultResourceSpecification
    This class provides a default implementation of the ResourceSpecification interface.
    DefaultService
    This class is a default implementation of the Service interface.
    DefaultServiceSpecification
    This class is a default implementation of the ServiceSpecification interface.
    DefaultServiceSpecificationTest
    This class tests the DefaultServiceSpecification class.
    DefaultTaskSet
    This class provides a default implementation of the TaskSet interface.
    DefaultTaskSpecification
    This class provides a default implementation of the TaskSpecification interface.
    TestTaskSetFactory
    This class provides TaskTypeSpecifications for testing purposes.
    TestTaskSpecification
    This implementation of the TaskSpecification is for test purposes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    VolumeSpecification.Type
    Types of Volumes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidTaskSpecificationException
    This class is an Exception to be used when unexpected errors are encountered in the handling of TaskSpecifications and TaskTypeSpecifications.
